metadata.title: TWRP - Starlight Brigade (feat. Dan Avidan) [Official video]
metadata.creator: TWRPtube

tracks.text: Stylistic note: this video is in the style of late 80's early 90's anime.
Text appears. TWRP featuring Dan Avidan. Knights of the Light Table.
Stars shine on a blue and purple night sky
A blue hand reaches up towards the brightest star
It twists into a ball and flies off. More stars follow.
A man with a boy on his shoulders stand on a cliff top, watching, alarmed.
The lights fly towards a floating upside down black pyramid. The pyramid glows as the sky darkens.
The boy reaches out a hand, eyes glistening

Older, the now teenage boy sits atop rubble, hand outstretched. The boy is blue with white hair. His long, rabbit like ears stick outwards. He wears a black shirt and shawl, with a glowing blue stone on his chest.
The older man approaches the boy. Green lights flash, and they watch a light streak across the sky.
The boy runs, looking at the sky, past houses made of welded, jumbled rubble.
The man looks at the boy. He looks back, as green light trails towards the mountains behind him. The boy gives a worried look, turns, and runs to the mountains.
A black, glossy object made of 5 spikes sits, partially submerged in a small pool. Smoke billows.
The boy hops across rocks in the pool, appraoching the spike object.
The boy sees his reflection in black object. He places a hand on it and it bubbles.
He falls forward through a wall and looks around at a control station. From the outside, the black spikes reform into a small, floating, white ship.
The looks at the controls, and closes his eyes. The face of the older man looks down at him.
The heart stone glows, and he looks up, eyes open. The older man's face passes behind him, eyes closed.
The control panel, made of copper circles and lines, glows beneath him.
He reaches out to 2 orbs on sticks on either side of his body. As he touches them, wings spring out to either side of the floating ship.
The ship flies forward, reaching the sky in a flash.
Colors race past the ship's windshield. The boy's surprise changes to excitement, then determination.
He flies through space, into the middle of a debris field.
A glowing screen holograms in front of him, showing a logo of a star inside an upside down pyramid.
A mustached man in an orange hat smiles.
The boy looks left, to see the man in a nearby ship, giving him a thumbs up.
From the outside, we see 5 ships flying in a U shape around the boy. In the cockpit, the pilots appear on 5 floating screens. The boy smiles.
A red masked humanoid, a blue lion, a black space samurai, and a yellow 8-legged robot smile.
The 6 ships approach a green armored ship with towering red windows.
A general gestures to figures on a grid. The 6 pilots look on.
The general makes a T shape and a slicing gesture with his hands. The 6 pilots take a determined stance.
On the grid, black spiky figures approach an upside down black pyramid.
The models on the grid start rattling. The boy looks up, worried.
The pyramid is nearby. The general directs the pilots down a corridor.
The pilots get in their ships.
The engines light up.
The 6 take off, headed to the pyramid.
Black and green spike ships approach
The boy screams, and dodges blasts of green light
At the center of the spike ships, light gathers in a circle like an eye. The boy flies between them as they fire, exploding each other.
The 6 ships fly together at the pyramid. They are stopped by a glowing green force field net.
The spike ships fire at them from behind.
The boy's ship begins to fall
In the cockpit, the boy holds his arm, as blood runs down his face. Screens spark, and the boy looks around.
The screen darkens. The boy reaches out his hand, his heart stone glowing dimly.
The boy sees a reflection of himself, on his knees, crying, arm outstretched.
He falls to his chair
The heart stone light dies
In a memory, the young boy runs towards a star.
The young boy smiles, reaching up to the star
He grabs it in his hands, light streaming through his fingers.
The heart stone glows. The control panel glows.
The boy makes a fist and stands.
His hair glows. His ears point up. His determined eyes alight with fire.
The ship shoots forward. He rams the green force field net, shattering a hole.
The other pilots watch, then ram their ships at the force field.
Their determined faces collect on screen, with the boy at the center.
Together, they force open the hole, and the entire pyramid's force field shatters, as the spike ships watch.
The ships fly to the black, glossy side of the pyramid.
The boy sees himself reflected in the pyramid as they fly into it.
In black and white, the 6 ships fly forward
The pilots brace themselves.
A white light drowns the ships.
The boy screams.
The pyramid explodes in a white cloud, while 6 rainbow colors emerge from the other side. The spike ships watch from nearby, bathed in the neon green flash.
The shockwave from the pyramid destroys the spike ships.
The boy watches as hundreds of lights fly in all directions.
Stars fly past the cheering pilots
The boy looks up at the starry sky, arms outstretched
Back on the planet, the older man looks up at the stars. A tear runs down his face.
In a spotlight, the boy holds up a fist
The other pilots appear behind him, posing.
Text appears. Starlight Brigade.
Credits roll.
